member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.GrammarInfo
member.summary: Represents information about a grammar.
member.remarks: This information may be used to define a set of files containing grammar definitions to be consumed by a speech recognition component.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.GrammarInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.GrammarInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The path to the grammar file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.GrammarInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the grammar.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.GrammarInfo.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the grammar file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.ISpeechRecognitionAlternate
member.summary: Represents a speech recognition alternate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.ISpeechRecognitionAlternate.Text
member.summary: Gets the text of this alternate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.ISpeechRecognitionAlternate.Confidence
member.summary: Gets the confidence score of this alternate.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.ISpeechRecognitionResult
member.summary: Defines a speech recognition result.
member.remarks: Components that perform speech recognition may output speech recognition results that implement this interface.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.ISpeechRecognitionResult.Text
member.summary: Gets the text of this ISpeechRecognitionResult.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.ISpeechRecognitionResult.Confidence
member.summary: Gets the confidence of this ISpeechRecognitionResult.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.ISpeechRecognitionResult.Alternates
member.summary: Gets the alternates of this ISpeechRecognitionResult.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.ISpeechRecognitionResult.Audio
member.summary: Gets the audio buffer that produced the recognition result. This may be empty where the audio is not available.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.ISpeechRecognitionResult.Duration
member.summary: Gets the duration of the audio that produced the recognition result.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.IStreamingSpeechRecognitionResult
member.summary: Defines an incremental, streaming speech recognition result which may be partial or final.
member.remarks: Components that perform streaming speech recognition (where partial hypotheses are generated while the speech is in progress) may output speech recognition results that implement this interface.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.IStreamingSpeechRecognitionResult.IsFinal
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this result is final (true), or if it is a partial hypothesis (false).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionAlternate
member.summary: Represents a speech recognition alternate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionAlternate.#ctor(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Double})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The confidence score of the alternate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionAlternate.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of this alternate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionAlternate.Confidence
member.summary: Gets or sets the confidence score of this alternate.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResult
member.summary: Represents a speech recognition result.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResult.#ctor(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Double},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionAlternate},System.Nullable{Microsoft.Psi.Audio.AudioBuffer},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The recognized text of this result.
The confidence score of the result.
The list of alternates for this result, as text strings.
The audio buffer that formed this result.
The duration of the audio that produced this recognition result.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResult.Text
member.summary: Gets the recognized text of this SpeechRecognitionResult.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResult.Confidence
member.summary: Gets the confidence score of the recognition result.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResult.Alternates
member.summary: Gets the alternates of this SpeechRecognitionResult.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResult.Audio
member.summary: Gets the audio buffer that produced the recognition result. This may be empty where the audio is not available.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResult.Duration
member.summary: Gets the duration of the audio that produced the recognition result.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResult.ToString
member.summary: Returns a display string for this SpeechRecognitionResult.
member.returns: A display string for this SpeechRecognitionResult.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.StreamingSpeechRecognitionResult
member.summary: Represents an incremental, streaming speech recognition result which may be partial or final.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.StreamingSpeechRecognitionResult.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Double},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Psi.Speech.SpeechRecognitionAlternate},System.Nullable{Microsoft.Psi.Audio.AudioBuffer},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Indicates whether this is a final or a partial result.
The recognized text of this result.
The confidence score of the result.
The list of alternates for this result, as text strings.
The audio buffer that formed this result.
The duration of the audio that produced this recognition result.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.Speech.StreamingSpeechRecognitionResult.IsFinal
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this result is final (true), or if it is a partial hypothesis (false).
